snippet: The Mets wanted to see how well Jenrry Mejia would pitch now that he was back in the majors. The answer on Saturday was pretty badly.
abstract: MLB Roundup; Milwaukee Brewers beat New York Mets, 9-6; other baseball results noted.
lead_paragraph: The Mets wanted to see how well Jenrry Mejia would pitch now that he was back in the majors. The answer on Saturday was pretty badly.

headline.seo: Mejia Falls Flat in Mets Loss to Brewers
headline.main: Mejia Bunts Well and Pitches Poorly in Mets’ Loss
headline.print_headline: Young Mets Starter Bunts Well but Pitches Poorly
